item.description:
Blues Cafe will be kicking off fall with a band and an excellent performance from New School Swing!

Shawn Hershey will be putting together a jazzy, growly trad jazz and blues combo for your dancing enjoyment. Julie Brown will bring the hotness on the DJ table when the band takes their breaks.

We'll also have a blues performance by the advanced students at New School Swing. Get ready to be wowed by their skill and the sweet sounds of Nina Simone!

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: Blues Cafe Trad Jazz & Blues Night!
